alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 03 at 4:30PM EDT until April 03 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Suwannee County in northern Florida... Southeastern Hamilton County in northern Florida... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 430 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Suwannee Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jasper, White Springs, Suwannee Springs and Belmont. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
